column1: Thank you to everyone who has reached out with prayers and well-wishes including @realDonaldTrump. Both Sue and I have appreciated your thoughts. We both feel rejuvenated and energized after our quarantine! We even enjoyed a beautiful hike in the snow on this Pure Michigan day! https://t.co/9EPRw2k4Eg

It has been an honor to have earned the votes of so many across the 7th District. Despite the challenges of COVID we benefited from an incredible swell of grassroots support. Working with one another America will continue to be a beacon of light for generations to come. https://t.co/kCadgf5ONu
Sue and I were excited to head to the polls this morning! We hope to earn your vote today! #MI07 https://t.co/950s9W8cH4

Great to share the stage with @IvankaTrump in Eaton Rapids mere hours before the election! Ivanka has worked hard to increase domestic and global prosperity. We're thrilled Michigan remains a top priority for the Trump team! #MAGA https://t.co/kZixTaWa0B

Hundreds of Trump supporters decorated their cars and trucks this weekend in Monroe to show support for President @realDonaldTrump. Never have I seen this type of enthusiasm before! Monroe wants #FourMoreYears https://t.co/NSV1Sov2EI

Another wonderful day in Monroe today! Every weekend volunteers have shown up from across the district to connect with voters because they recognize this election is so important. We're incredibly thankful to all those folks for their efforts. #GOTV https://t.co/eWrCjcoRyG

#TeamWalberg includes my amazing wife Sue. Since I haven’t yet figured out how to be in two places at one time Sue filled in for me in Jackson at the @MIGOP bus tour while I kicked off #GOTV efforts in Monroe. https://t.co/gMMU9HxMUW
President @realDonaldTrump has delivered for the people of Michigan. Thankful that Michigan has remained a top priority for the President! #MAGA https://t.co/BhJpzsUEuH
Signaling a V-shaped economic recovery the U.S. economy grew at its fastest pace ever in the 3rd quarter. https://t.co/EXSapVUqz0
@WaszakChloe is one of the hardest workers we’ve had in SE MI. Fortunate to have her working with Trump Victory in the 7th District! https://t.co/KrzFivlLPB

On a cold and rainy Michigan day I’d like to extend a warm Michigan welcome to @realDonaldTrump. Thank you for all you’ve done for Michigan families manufacturers and farmers. We’re ready for #fourmoreyears! #MAGA https://t.co/4rmIh7ibog
A well-deserved congratulations to Justice Amy Coney Barrett who is going to make a terrific addition to the bench for many years to come.  https://t.co/k2YkRDOcdi
No better way to treat myself after a door to door weekend in Eaton County than a trip to Potterville for Joe’s Gizzard City for their nationally acclaimed gizzards! 😋 https://t.co/4kvNpo2DRr

Even with the Big Ten kickoff today many enthusiastic volunteers came out to Grand Ledge to knock doors for our team and Team @JohnJamesMI! Thank you to all those who volunteered and thank you to Senator Barrett for your motivational words! https://t.co/olzzyFisHP

It was a pleasure introducing Michigan's next great Senator @JohnJamesMI last night in Bedford. His values determination and passion will make Michigan proud these next 6 years. #LetsFlyMI https://t.co/BScNJjzFR8

President @realDonaldTrump offered an America First results-oriented message and a clear vision to get our economy back on track. In 47 months Trump has done more for this country than Joe Biden has in his 47 years in politics. America deserves #FourMoreYears! #MAGA

@JohnJamesMI has been gaining ground quickly and has a ton of momentum. His endorsement last night from the @DetNewsOpinion acknowledges he'd be a true leader in the Senate and has the ability to get the job done. #LetsFlyMI  https://t.co/HzEtExkUVx
Great to be in Milan to catch up with a fellow motorcycle enthusiast! #looktwicesavealife https://t.co/4dGDVLy1zj

The line was out the door to see @EricTrump in Monroe County. What a pleasure to discuss defending the Constitution ending NAFTA and helping our farmers! All thanks to @realDonaldTrump! #MAGA #FourMoreYears https://t.co/26Mo2hZcNn
Thank you @EricTrump for coming to Monroe County! #MAGA https://t.co/YEnledOJOs

Thank you to @EricTrump for coming to Jackson and visiting Andy’s Place a first-of-its-kind long-term opioid rehab facility. @realDonaldTrump has done so much to fight the opioid crisis and we’re thankful they continue to highlight this critical issue impacting our community. https://t.co/Q7HTSElv8m

Despite claims by Adam Schiff someone already on record lying about Russian collusion @DNI_Ratcliffe says Hunter Biden's emails are "not part of some Russian disinformation campaign.”  There are many questions that must be answered. https://t.co/cZndDP5dSO

Thanks to the volunteers who layered up to hit doors in Monroe. Despite the cold weather the team was eager to  contact voters about the promises kept by the @realDonaldTrump Administration and some of the legislation I have helped pass in Congress! #KAG #TVMI20 #LeadRight https://t.co/EPrAguTmcO

Wonderful to speak at @CPAC Michigan. We've already conducted a drive-thru campaign event and now we can check off a drive-in event! Thanks for allowing me to speak on @realDonaldTrump's pro-Michigan policies. #CPACMichigan https://t.co/J0C9h7MgAa
Life is the most precious gift God gives us. It is an honor to have received the endorsement of @nrlc and I will continue to defend our most vulnerable. https://t.co/HDc9dioH7b

On this #FarmersDay I’d like to thank all the hardworking men and women who work to put food on our table. I’m proud to have received the AgriPac endorsement from @MichFarmBureau and I will continue to make sure that farmers have a voice in Congress. https://t.co/QL0PsubbuJ

Our team connected with 5000+ voters in Jackson and over 10000+ voters across #MI07 this weekend. There is no doubt voters are eager to return to the economic growth that @realDonaldTrump's policies created. https://t.co/MyoORchf86

Thank you to the many volunteers who got up early on a Saturday morning to connect with voters across Jackson County. It was great talking with everyone especially all the folks who decided to volunteer for the first time! https://t.co/kkI2xnuAZK
Proud to have the @DetNewsOpinion endorsement and eager to continue to get results for the people of #MI07. https://t.co/OXYC8hrIHU

Proud to be named a "Taxpayer Hero" by @GovWaste. I've worked in a bipartisan manner to increase transparency cut wasteful spending and make sure your taxpayer dollars are being spent efficiently. https://t.co/jHHwTOc0la
With many nefarious actors out there I'm glad to see the House take an important action to strengthen our energy cybersecurity infrastructure.  https://t.co/qIEh0GkHbH
Monroe is excited about the nomination of Judge Amy Coney Barrett and excited to re-elect President @realDonaldTrump in 5 weeks! #KAG https://t.co/vzBcfBIl0o

Judge Amy Coney Barrett is an extremely bright legal mind. President @realDonaldTrump selected an incredibly well-qualified nominee who will make a wonderful #SCOTUS Justice. #FillTheSeat   https://t.co/a1qqh6E1BR
Thank you President @realDonaldTrump for taking a crucial step towards protecting the most vulnerable among us and stopping this form of infanticide. #BornAlive   https://t.co/iUE81GMa9O

Driving in MI07? Chances are you will see an orange and blue Walberg sign.  We ordered more signs THAN EVER BEFORE and by early September had to order even more!  Thank you for your unwavering support and enthusiasm! https://t.co/a8ipaLOGqS

#DishonestDriskell is at it again - attacking me for providing relief for Michigan workers and small businesses.  She claims I voted to make a slush fund via H.R.6800 the largest bill in history and a Pelosi liberal wish-list.  One problem with her claim - I VOTED NO on H.R.6800 https://t.co/rOndGGijdd

Happy to receive endorsements from the @LansingChamber and @DetroitChamber. I’m looking forward to working with my colleagues to revitalize our economy and help create more family-sustaining jobs in Michigan. https://t.co/GaspqFOUjR

Great to be at the Monroe Trump Victory Office Grand Opening last night to talk about #PromisesMadePromisesKept.   Monroe knows President @realDonaldTrump puts America First. Enthusiasm is at an all-time high! #MAGA https://t.co/fZkpOnhPUs

Proud to be named a Friend of Agriculture and receive the AgriPac Endorsement. From negotiating better trade deals to cutting onerous and restrictive red tape I am proud to work for the farmers of Michigan’s 7th District. Thank you @MichFarmBureau! https://t.co/KeKgCJQse7

On this day in 1787 our Founding Fathers enshrined our rights in a new document - the Constitution of the United States. Today we celebrate the rights liberties and system of government we enjoy thanks to their wisdom.  #ConstitutionDay https://t.co/utPydRUf3X
Prayers go out to the victim’s family. A tragic situation could have been even worse if it wasn’t for the bravery of a trained woman prepared to take heroic action.  https://t.co/L3iraoOA4B

I will always defend your constitutional rights. In Congress I have a strong record protecting the 2nd Amendment and am proud to once again receive an endorsement from the @NRAPVF and “A” rating from the @NRA. https://t.co/kQzZjRdN6g

Today was another historic day in our efforts to achieve peace in the Middle East. Despite roadblocks in Congress from Speaker Pelosi President @realDonaldTrump continues to deliver on his promises. #PromisesMadePromisesKept   https://t.co/cvMJZeIars

Before my opponent supported a strike to defund the police I signed a pledge to oppose any legislation to defund the police. We must not defund the police but rather #DefendThePolice https://t.co/JKxwf1A5CQ

Looting and crime have swept across the nation. Law enforcement has been targeted due to anti-police rhetoric. Yet my opponent is supporting a strike demanding the defunding of police. I understand the sacrifices those of law enforcement make and I will continue to #BackTheBlue https://t.co/lDsZw5B2Xs

You’ve gotten pick up from your favorite restaurant. You’ve gone to drive-thrus for coffee. This year’s annual picnic was a drive-thru and a massive success!! Thank you all for your generous support. https://t.co/dT2H9mZNYf
Great to have @realDonaldTrump in Michigan last night! You can feel the Enthusiasm to re-elect the President! #KAG #MAGA #FOURMOREYEARS https://t.co/R7Z5N4KDYf

19 years ago today our world forever changed. We remember the lives lost and the brave sacrifices so many of our first responders and civilians made that day. We must not forget the heroes or the devastation of this terrorist attack. #NeverForget
Taking concrete steps to minimize military involvement in the Middle East the Israel-UAE peace deal and so much more. Few would be more deserving than @realDonaldTrump   https://t.co/5ebMAk3wu1

Wonderful to speak at #FarmersAndRanchersForTrump in Jackson County. From USMCA to tax reform the @realDonaldTrump Administration has done so much for the farming community in the past 3 years. #KAG https://t.co/uLVEq0GZpq
The Great American Comeback is well underway. Let’s make sure to stick with the elected officials that helped build the best economy in American history! https://t.co/dCE0VXk8RQ

It is fashionable for the political elites to attack President Trump because he fights for the American people. All this does is reinforce the fact that the Republican Party is now the party of hardworking men and women. https://t.co/PU46j8wgKj
Political leaders like Speaker Pelosi should be expected to follow the same rules that they set.  https://t.co/6y3lw4WXYi
Congratulations @realDonaldTrump on accepting the @GOP nomination for President! #MAGA2020 https://t.co/pllvxEnWva
Land of Promise 🇺🇸 Land of Opportunity 🇺🇸 Land of Heroes 🇺🇸 Land of Greatness #MAGA #FourMoreYears https://t.co/EsDmu0fLUv
Great to see @MIGOPChair proudly representing the birthplace of the @GOP at the White House tonight! https://t.co/Jkvu8RrHLq
Sue and I are honored to be at the White House to see @realDonaldTrump accept the @GOP Nomination! #FourMoreYears https://t.co/jFRqFspGVv
Thank you to all our heroic frontline workers parents and law enforcement. Great speech by a true American hero @DanCrenshawTX https://t.co/Njav5QC6EM
Very graceful speech. We’re fortunate to have @FLOTUS  serving as First Lady and leading us all to #BeBest https://t.co/v9ZdV6g3nX

Tonight we were reminded by so many with markedly different backgrounds why we all should take pride in being Americans. Tonight I’m proud of my party and so proud of my country! 🇺🇸 https://t.co/vjCZ0EXf5v

Thank you @MIGOPChair for representing our great state displaying our significant historical legacy as the birthplace of the @GOP and showcasing our many fantastic leaders like @GOPChairwoman! https://t.co/s26fVo6K49

Representative Tim Walberg’s (R. Mich.) Fifth Amendment Integrity Restoration (FAIR) Act is an opportunity for Congress to nevertheless come together for bipartisan and meaningful change.  https://t.co/O4x0yMexQt
And thanks to all of the eager volunteers ready to get involved! https://t.co/5v1uQB8wQY
Incredible step towards achieving long-lasting peace in the Middle East. https://t.co/DMCHpgbU61
Our dedicated team has been working hard to get our results-oriented message to voters across all 7 counties of Michigan's 7th District! https://t.co/ox08G5yhNB
Ironic that a country on the UN Human Rights Council is sanctioning American citizens for promoting freedom.  https://t.co/sZ0oXKCZTT
Our yard signs are in! We’ll start delivering them in the next few weeks.  Sign up below to receive one!  https://t.co/KWwEPAyJLW
From county commissioner to U.S. Senate there are many important races on the ballot today. Make sure to get out and vote! #MIPrimary https://t.co/3QNYbioAel

Proud to receive the endorsement of the @NFIB FedPAC the voice for small business. I will continue to fight for small businesses in Congress and I am honored to once again have the support of such a great organization. https://t.co/xFuqFL9qHG
64 years ago today America officially adopted a national motto: "In God We Trust.” In these challenging times may faith continue to guide us.

Social Security recipients deserve to have a guaranteed increase in their cost-of-living adjustment. Seniors also deserve to have more notice so they can properly plan and budget.   Learn more about my proposal below 👇 https://t.co/qiKMT1xE8M
This type of political discrimination in our schools is wholly unacceptable. https://t.co/lMobvdfFN7
Thank you AG Barr for visiting Michigan and highlighting China’s undercutting tactics.  https://t.co/1wxkVkQYQG

On this day in 1854 a group of abolitionists gathered Under the Oaks in Jackson MI to create a new political party. For these past 166 years the Republican Party has worked to protect personal freedoms and liberty for all. https://t.co/pZKy22YEqq
Celebrating a beautiful Independence Day at the Grass Lake 4th of July Parade. https://t.co/Q41g0LOlaj

Today on our Independence Day we as Americans have an opportunity to celebrate all the things that make America so special. We live in the freest and most prosperous nation in the world.   Happy 4th of July! https://t.co/UV2JDTEzUC
Thank you @realDonaldTrump for putting NAFTA behind us and negotiating a deal that levels the playing field for Michigan manufacturers farmers and workers. https://t.co/zeaL2OYocT

We’re just HOURS AWAY from a crucial financial deadline and I need your help.   Please support:  🗽 Liberty and Justice for all 💵 Pro-jobs economic policy 🇺🇸 American exceptionalism  https://t.co/GMHpigc29v

One of my top priorities is creating a pro-jobs agenda to provide economic growth and allow all Americans a chance at living their American Dream. Before COVID-19 we saw a record-setting economy and I will continue to work hard in Congress to restore those successes. https://t.co/c6iDKNDJvl

While I'm fighting against Nancy Pelosi's radical agenda in Washington we're coming up on a big fundraising deadline and I need your support.  Please consider chipping in and keeping Michigan red!  https://t.co/8jPS9wkvSg
@TwitterGov Just completed my @ballotpedia questionnaire. Thanks @TwitterGov and @ballotpedia for your partnership.
Wishing all the fathers and grandfathers a special day. https://t.co/yfeMuGsvzR
The greatest gift from God is the gift of life. It was an honor to spend part of the first day of summer with Jackson Right to Life remembering the lives of the unborn. https://t.co/C4xd23elxq
On June 19 1865 the last American slaves were freed. Every American regardless of race has inalienable rights to freedom and liberty.  Happy Juneteenth!
Great sign as we undergo a massive economic comeback! https://t.co/uuMI8E32Z4
243 years ago today the Second Continental Congress adopted a flag that has grown to symbolize so many American values we cherish. #flagday2020 https://t.co/fAfdP8v1IU
Wishing you a wonderful birthday @realDonaldTrump!
I appreciated the opportunity to discuss pro-job policy and other issues facing Monroe County at the Bedford Business Association Meet the Candidates event. https://t.co/cu61hfZvBg
Happy Birthday @Mike_Pence! https://t.co/UHpUKKQdrW
Today we remember all of the truly courageous service members who gave the ultimate sacrifice. May God bless them and their families. https://t.co/VpdwSTsVo0
On this #NationalNursesDay Sue and I would like to say thank you to all the nurses working during this difficult time. Your commitment and many sacrifices are heroic.
In these difficult times we’re reminded of how blessed we are for first responders medical professionals and everyone throughout our community for stepping up to help. https://t.co/BZStl7vtrF
Went fishing today for my birthday and wanted to share a few thoughts about the Governor's latest executive order.  https://t.co/93JIje3ZyP
Wishing you a happy and blessed Easter! https://t.co/H5y5IhDvix

Over this past weekend I had the chance to reset my flag pole that’s proudly displayed the American flag in my front yard for 31 years. America is going to beat this virus together under this great flag! 🇺🇸 https://t.co/WUV7ECQVSN
A blessed Palm Sunday to you and yours. This Holy Week will give us much-needed perspective and remind us that we will get through this period. https://t.co/bsUJFXKbu9
Today is National Agriculture Day. Thank you to all the farmers who work tirelessly to keep food on our shelves. Your work does not go unnoticed.
Thanks @realDonaldTrump for delivering on your promises which resonate with so many across Michigan! #KAG2020 https://t.co/r2AXOeKOmH
The state of our union is stronger than ever before. FOUR MORE YEARS! https://t.co/bhsKPO98f0
